name: Surgery Squad's Virtual Root Canal Procedure
name_original: Surgery Squad's Virtual Root Canal Procedure
description:
*** RANKED TOP 5 EDUCATIONAL GAME IN 3 COUNTRIES ***

Take on the role of a Virtual Dentist – You are in control as you perform a root canal procedure on a patient’s teeth in this interactive educational game!

What could be worse than a root canal? A lot of things! The root canal is probably one of the most misunderstood dental procedures performed today, and is thought to be incredibly painful with lasting side effects. Not true! A root canal is an endodontic procedure used to repair and save an abscessed or decayed tooth. During this interactive root canal, you will isolate the tooth and clean the tooth’s root canal with a special file. After irrigating the area to clean it thoroughly, you will fill the cavity with a compound known as gutta-percha and seal it off. When finished, you will learn how to avoid tooth decay and dental disease in the future. That doesn’t sound bad, does it? Scrub in and let’s get started!

FEATURES:
* Highly interactive virtual dentistry
* Drill, scrape and pack your way to a new tooth!
* Interactive preparation and procedure!
* Great for kids & adults
